type: Legendary Creature – Human Warlock Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Book of Worlds[/i] – At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only on legendary creature spells.
[i]Contract[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Return target legendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn.
